import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Alert, Badge, Button, Table,Figure, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default class Cart extends Component { render() { const {cartItems} = this.props return ( {cartItems.length ===0? (Cart is empty) : ( {cartItems.map(item =>( ))}
You Have {cartItems.length}items in your Cart
Quantity Price
{item.count} {item.price}
Total { cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price * c.count, 0) } $
) } ); } }
